titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to extend for two years the credit for qualified microturbine property.
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to extend for two years the credit for qualified microturbine property.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: This bill amends the Internal Revenue Code to extend through December 31, 2018, the tax credit for qualified microturbine property.
